name: 4th International Conference on Gerontology and Geriatrics Medicine
content: The 4th International Conference on Gerontology and Geriatrics Medicine, Silver Age 2023 will be hosted by iConferences with the collaboration of the International Institute of Ageing, United Nations â€“ Malta. Promising a memorable experience for all the participants, the Silver Age 2023 will be held as a hybrid conference based in Colombo, Sri Lanka on 26-27 May 2023\. It is expected to take initiatives in commencing the continuous process of healthy aging in order to optimize and improve the physical, mental, and social well-being of the elderly population and thereby enhance the quality of life. We extend a warm invitation to all the researchers, professionals, and enthusiasts to join this impactful event and submit your abstracts.
